## Checklist
- [ ] `npm run lint` passes
- [ ] `npm run typecheck` passes
- [ ] `npm run build` passes
- [ ] Tests updated (or not needed)
- [ ] No breaking SEO routes (check sitemap)
- [ ] DB migration is safe (no destructive ops)
- [ ] Screenshots for UI changes (if applicable)
- [ ] No new `noindex` pages without justification

## SEO Impact
- [ ] No routes changed
- [ ] Routes added (list below)
- [ ] Routes removed (⚠️ add redirects)
